mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_dict
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict (id, value, label, type, description, sort, parent_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, mark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
